name: Detective's Office
description: The central hub for investigation, filled with clues and tools for solving mysteries.

items.name: Magnifying Glass
items.description: An essential tool for any detective looking to uncover the finer details of a case.

items.name: Notebook
items.description: An essential tool for you to write down everything that you encounter.

items.name: Trench Coat
items.description: A classic detective's trench coat with hidden pockets.

name: Coach Marlowe’s Office
description: Office of the esteemed Coach Marlowe, known for his dedication to the team's success.

items.name: Football Yearbook
items.description: A yearbook filled with details about the football team, including some suspicious annotations.

name: Mega Stadium Hallway
description: A bustling corridor in the stadium, echoing with the sounds of excited fans.

people.name: Janitor Joe
people.description: Caretaker of the premises with access to all areas, including the janitor's closet.
people.suspectReason: Has unrestricted access to all rooms, raising suspicion.

name: Janitor's Closet
description: A small, cramped space filled with cleaning supplies and the occasional clue.

items.name: Sticky Note
items.description: A sticky note with a cryptic message that could lead to a breakthrough in the case.
